subject: Re: files concerning the quake,
author: Jill
full_text:
I can't open these.  There doesn't appear to be files there to open, at least not for me.  (My wacky computer again?)  Anyway, I'm sad -- I wanted to hear them!



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Got these, one of my guides called David was  being paged to come back to 
> Heaven to help with the emergency situation, seems  they are taking in over 
> 2,000 souls and it's been climbing.  They have  their hands full over there 
> that's for sure.  sf
>
